alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 16 at 4:24AM EST until December 16 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...The Florida Keys * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Strong showers and thunderstorms are expected to develop later today and this evening in association with a strengthening low moving northeastward through the Gulf of Mexico. Rainfall rates will increase today, approaching an inch or more per hour at times, as lines of showers and thunderstorms spread north across the island chain. Through the next 36 hours, storm totals at most communities will reach 2 to 4 inches of additional rainfall, with localized amounts of 6 inches or more possible. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Lower Keys; Monroe Middle Keys
